00001 /*******************************************************************************
00002 *
00003 * FILE:           safer.c
00004 *
00005 * DESCRIPTION:    block-cipher algorithm SAFER (Secure And Fast Encryption
00006 *                 Routine) in its four versions: SAFER K-64, SAFER K-128,
00007 *                 SAFER SK-64 and SAFER SK-128.
00008 *
00009 * AUTHOR:         Richard De Moliner (demoliner@isi.ee.ethz.ch)
00010 *                 Signal and Information Processing Laboratory
00011 *                 Swiss Federal Institute of Technology
00012 *                 CH-8092 Zuerich, Switzerland
00013 *
00014 * DATE:           September 9, 1995
00015 *
00016 * CHANGE HISTORY:
00017 *
00018 *******************************************************************************/

00020 /******************* External Headers *****************************************/
00021 
00022 /******************* Local Headers ********************************************/
00023 #include "safer.h"
00024 
00025 /******************* Constants ************************************************/
00026 #define TAB_LEN      256
00027 
00028 /******************* Assertions ***********************************************/
00029 
00030 /******************* Macros ***************************************************/
00031 #define ROL(x, n)    ((unsigned char)((unsigned int)(x) << (n)\
00032                                      |(unsigned int)((x) & 0xFF) >> (8 - (n))))
00033 #define EXP(x)       exp_tab[(x) & 0xFF]
00034 #define LOG(x)       log_tab[(x) & 0xFF]
00035 #define PHT(x, y)    { y += x; x += y; }
00036 #define IPHT(x, y)   { x -= y; y -= x; }
00037 
00038 /******************* Types ****************************************************/
00039 static unsigned char exp_tab[TAB_LEN];
00040 static unsigned char log_tab[TAB_LEN];
00041 
00042 /******************* Module Data **********************************************/
00043 
00044 /******************* Functions ************************************************/
00045 
00046 /******************************************************************************/
00047 #ifndef NOT_ANSI_C
00048     void Safer_Init_Module(void)
00049 #else
00050     Safer_Init_Module()
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 {   unsigned int i, exp;
00054 
00055     exp = 1;
00056     for (i = 0; i < TAB_LEN; i++)
00057     {
00058         exp_tab[i] = (unsigned char)(exp & 0xFF);
00059         log_tab[exp_tab[i]] = (unsigned char)i;
00060         exp = exp * 45 % 257;
00061     }
00062 } /* Safer_Init_Module */
00063 
00064 /******************************************************************************/
00065 #ifndef NOT_ANSI_C
00066     void Safer_Expand_Userkey(safer_block_t userkey_1,
00067                               safer_block_t userkey_2,
00068                               unsigned int nof_rounds,
00069                               int strengthened,
00070                               safer_key_t key)
00071 #else
00072     Safer_Expand_Userkey(userkey_1, userkey_2, nof_rounds, strengthened, key)
00073     safer_block_t userkey_1;
00074     safer_block_t userkey_2;
00075     unsigned int nof_rounds;
00076     int strengthened;
00077     safer_key_t key;
00078 #endif
00079 
00080 {   unsigned int i, j;
00081     unsigned char ka[SAFER_BLOCK_LEN + 1];
00082     unsigned char kb[SAFER_BLOCK_LEN + 1];
00083 
00084     if (SAFER_MAX_NOF_ROUNDS < nof_rounds)
00085         nof_rounds = SAFER_MAX_NOF_ROUNDS;
00086     *key++ = (unsigned char)nof_rounds;
00087     ka[SAFER_BLOCK_LEN] = 0;
00088     kb[SAFER_BLOCK_LEN] = 0;
00089     for (j = 0; j < SAFER_BLOCK_LEN; j++)
00090     {
00091         ka[SAFER_BLOCK_LEN] ^= ka[j] = ROL(userkey_1[j], 5);
00092         kb[SAFER_BLOCK_LEN] ^= kb[j] = *key++ = userkey_2[j];
00093     }
00094     for (i = 1; i <= nof_rounds; i++)
00095     {
00096         for (j = 0; j < SAFER_BLOCK_LEN + 1; j++)
00097         {
00098             ka[j] = ROL(ka[j], 6);
00099             kb[j] = ROL(kb[j], 6);
00100         }
00101         for (j = 0; j < SAFER_BLOCK_LEN; j++)
00102             if (strengthened)
00103                 *key++ = (ka[(j + 2 * i - 1) % (SAFER_BLOCK_LEN + 1)]
00104                                 + exp_tab[exp_tab[18 * i + j + 1]]) & 0xFF;
00105             else
00106                 *key++ = (ka[j] + exp_tab[exp_tab[18 * i + j + 1]]) & 0xFF;
00107         for (j = 0; j < SAFER_BLOCK_LEN; j++)
00108             if (strengthened)
00109                 *key++ = (kb[(j + 2 * i) % (SAFER_BLOCK_LEN + 1)]
00110                                 + exp_tab[exp_tab[18 * i + j + 10]]) & 0xFF;
00111             else
00112                 *key++ = (kb[j] + exp_tab[exp_tab[18 * i + j + 10]]) & 0xFF;
00113     }
00114     for (j = 0; j < SAFER_BLOCK_LEN + 1; j++)
00115         ka[j] = kb[j] = 0;
00116 } /* Safer_Expand_Userkey */
00117 
00118 /******************************************************************************/
00119 #ifndef NOT_ANSI_C
00120     void Safer_Encrypt_Block(safer_block_t block_in, safer_key_t key, 
00121                              safer_block_t block_out)
00122 #else
00123     Safer_Encrypt_Block(block_in, key, block_out)
00124     safer_block_t block_in;
00125     safer_key_t key;
00126     safer_block_t block_out;
00127 #endif
00128 
00129 {   unsigned char a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h, t;
00130     unsigned int round;
00131 
00132     a = block_in[0]; b = block_in[1]; c = block_in[2]; d = block_in[3];
00133     e = block_in[4]; f = block_in[5]; g = block_in[6]; h = block_in[7];
00134     if (SAFER_MAX_NOF_ROUNDS < (round = *key)) round = SAFER_MAX_NOF_ROUNDS;
00135     while(round--)
00136     {
00137         a ^= *++key; b += *++key; c += *++key; d ^= *++key;
00138         e ^= *++key; f += *++key; g += *++key; h ^= *++key;
00139         a = EXP(a) + *++key; b = LOG(b) ^ *++key;
00140         c = LOG(c) ^ *++key; d = EXP(d) + *++key;
00141         e = EXP(e) + *++key; f = LOG(f) ^ *++key;
00142         g = LOG(g) ^ *++key; h = EXP(h) + *++key;
00143         PHT(a, b); PHT(c, d); PHT(e, f); PHT(g, h);
00144         PHT(a, c); PHT(e, g); PHT(b, d); PHT(f, h);
00145         PHT(a, e); PHT(b, f); PHT(c, g); PHT(d, h);
00146         t = b; b = e; e = c; c = t; t = d; d = f; f = g; g = t;
00147     }
00148     a ^= *++key; b += *++key; c += *++key; d ^= *++key;
00149     e ^= *++key; f += *++key; g += *++key; h ^= *++key;
00150     block_out[0] = a & 0xFF; block_out[1] = b & 0xFF;
00151     block_out[2] = c & 0xFF; block_out[3] = d & 0xFF;
00152     block_out[4] = e & 0xFF; block_out[5] = f & 0xFF;
00153     block_out[6] = g & 0xFF; block_out[7] = h & 0xFF;
00154 } /* Safer_Encrypt_Block */
00155 
00156 /******************************************************************************/
00157 #ifndef NOT_ANSI_C
00158     void Safer_Decrypt_Block(safer_block_t block_in, safer_key_t key, 
00159                              safer_block_t block_out)
00160 #else
00161     Safer_Decrypt_Block(block_in, key, block_out)
00162     safer_block_t block_in;
00163     safer_key_t key;
00164     safer_block_t block_out;
00165 #endif
00166 
00167 {   unsigned char a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h, t;
00168     unsigned int round;
00169 
00170     a = block_in[0]; b = block_in[1]; c = block_in[2]; d = block_in[3];
00171     e = block_in[4]; f = block_in[5]; g = block_in[6]; h = block_in[7];
00172     if (SAFER_MAX_NOF_ROUNDS < (round = *key)) round = SAFER_MAX_NOF_ROUNDS;
00173     key += SAFER_BLOCK_LEN * (1 + 2 * round);
00174     h ^= *key; g -= *--key; f -= *--key; e ^= *--key;
00175     d ^= *--key; c -= *--key; b -= *--key; a ^= *--key;
00176     while (round--)
00177     {
00178         t = e; e = b; b = c; c = t; t = f; f = d; d = g; g = t;
00179         IPHT(a, e); IPHT(b, f); IPHT(c, g); IPHT(d, h);
00180         IPHT(a, c); IPHT(e, g); IPHT(b, d); IPHT(f, h);
00181         IPHT(a, b); IPHT(c, d); IPHT(e, f); IPHT(g, h);
00182         h -= *--key; g ^= *--key; f ^= *--key; e -= *--key;
00183         d -= *--key; c ^= *--key; b ^= *--key; a -= *--key;
00184         h = LOG(h) ^ *--key; g = EXP(g) - *--key;
00185         f = EXP(f) - *--key; e = LOG(e) ^ *--key;
00186         d = LOG(d) ^ *--key; c = EXP(c) - *--key;
00187         b = EXP(b) - *--key; a = LOG(a) ^ *--key;
00188     }
00189     block_out[0] = a & 0xFF; block_out[1] = b & 0xFF;
00190     block_out[2] = c & 0xFF; block_out[3] = d & 0xFF;
00191     block_out[4] = e & 0xFF; block_out[5] = f & 0xFF;
00192     block_out[6] = g & 0xFF; block_out[7] = h & 0xFF;
00193 } /* Safer_Decrypt_Block */
